page.title: 11CARNIVAL
page.content: On the 5th of July 1985 Hale had it's annual carnival.It takes place on the Upper Hale Road and finishes at Hale Rec.There are lots of floats in it and also lots of people walking along. They all dress up and sometimes give out sweets,ballons and paper hats.There are lots of different ideas for dressing up such as clowns,pirates and sportsmen. The carnival starts at 7.30.After the carnival there is a fair and some stalls.There are dodgems,candyfloss,hotdogs,tombola, football,waltzer and haunted mill. At about 10.30 they had fire works. They spend a few hundred pounds on them. The fireworks last about 15 minutes.
